title: Teamfight Tactics - /Dev Update: Balance and Bugfix Log
body:
Hey Everyone,

Starting with patch 9.14 and beyond, we’ll be on a consistent weekly patch cycle for TFT patch notes. In the meantime, we’ve been updating at a fast and furious pace and we’ve been sharing our changes at a similar cadence. But that speed has a price and, understandably, you might’ve missed something. So, we wanted to aggregate all the changes over the last week in one place.

Without further ado:

**July 3rd (These changes just went live)** 

_Units_

Pyke
Stun Duration: 2.5/3/3.5 >>> 2/2.5/3

_Traits_

Yordle
Dodge Chance: 20/50% >>> 25/60%

_Items_

Spear of Shojin
Mana on-hit: 20% >>> 15% (For real this time)

**July 1st**

_Tier 2 and 3 units_

Tier 2 and 3 units are currently too risky to star-up when compared to tier 1’s. To broaden the pool of champions worth considering, we’re increasing the probability of finding Tier 2’s and 3’s in the shop while reducing the amount of Tier 1’s that appear.

_Champions_

Elise
Mana cost: 100>>>75

Kennen
Attack Damage: 60 >>> 70
Attack Speed: .6 >>> .65

Poppy
Health: 750 >>> 800
Mana cost: 100 >>> 75

Varus
Mana cost: 100 >>> 75

Veigar
Mana cost: 100 >>> 85
Damage: 300 - 600 >>> 300 - 700

Volibear
Attack speed: .5 >>> .55

Miss Fortune
Mana cost: 100 >>> 75

Karthus
Mana cost: 100 >>> 85

_Traits_

Demon
Demons are underperforming. We’re increasing their reliability.
Proc chance: 30/50/70% >>> 40/60/80%

_General_

Adjusted tier drop rates.

**June 29th**

_Traits_

Exile
Shield no longer scales with Spell Power

_Items_

Morellonomicon
Burn is no longer triggered by damage from Ionic Spark, Statikk Shiv, and Titanic Hydra 
Burn Damage: 5% >>> 2.5%

**June 27th**

_Champions_

Garen
Spinning is too good at winning (especially with Morellonomicon and tank items)
Damage: 540 - 1080 >>> 450 - 720

_Items_

Rapid Firecannon
Fixed a bug where RFC would stop granting bonus range

**June 25th**

_Items_

Seraph's Embrace
Fixed a bug where Seraph’s didn't grant mana after cast

_General_

Added colored circles to shared draft to help players locate their Little Legend

**June 23**

_Units and Traits Part 1_

Aurelion Sol
Real talk - Aurelion Sol is OP. We’re making his ability take longer to work up to, and buffing Karthus and Morgana to give other Sorcerers their time to shine
Damage: 300-700 >>> 250-650
Mana cost: 100 >>> 125

Karthus
Damage: 300 - 800 >>> 350 - 850

Morgana
Health: 600 >>> 650

Gunslingers
Gunslingers are falling behind other carry-centric teams so we’re buffing some of their key champions

Gangplank
Damage: 150 - 400 >>> 200 - 450

Miss Fortune
Attack Speed: .75 >>> .85

Lucian
Attack Damage: 60 >>> 65
Attack Speed: .6 >>> .65

Tristana
Attack speed: .65 >>> .7
Explosive Charge damage: 125-250>>> 150 - 300

Wild
Nerfing Wild a bit given how powerful Attack Speed has ended up being in TFT
Attack Speed per Stack: 8% >>> 7%

Nidalee:
Heal: 200-600 >>> 150-600
AD in cougar: 30 - 120 >>> 20 - 120

_Units and Traits Part 2_

Tier 2 champions
The tier-2 roster in TFT is weak right now.  We’re buffing a number of them to make tier-2 star-ups worth pursuing.

Blitzcrank 
Damage: 100 - 600 >>> 100 - 800

Elise
Lifesteal: 60-100% >>> 60-120%
Spiderling health: 250 >>> 500

Shen
Attack damage: 55 >>> 65

Pyke
CC duration: 2-3 >>> 2.5-3.5
Mana cost: 125 >>> 100
Attack Speed: .55 >>> .6

Varus
Cast Time: 2s >>> 1.5s

Zed
Attack Damage: 55 >>> 60
Attack Speed: .6 >>> .65

_And Even More!_

Aatrox
Health: 650 >>> 750
Damage: 300 - 700 >>> 350 - 850

Akali
Damage: 150 - 500 >>> 200 - 550
Attack Speed: .7 >>> .75

Darius
Health: 650 >>> 600

Garen
No changes for now. We’re paying attention to how good spinning is at winning

Yasuo
HP: 650 >>> 700

_Items_

Bringing down the power of Spear and Zeke’s given their dominance in the current meta.  Also buffing up a few of the lesser used items.

Zeke’s Herald
Attack Speed aura: 20% >>> 10%

Rapid Fire Cannon
Fixed a bug where RFC was giving triple range (instead of double)

Spear of Shojin
Mana per attack: 20% >>> 15% (Note: This didn’t actually work)

Guardian Angel
Revive health: 300 >>> 500

Ionic Spark
Damage: 100 >>> 200

Luden’s Echo
Damage: 100 >>> 200

Thornmail
Damage reflect: 25% >>> 35%

Warmog’s Armor
Max Health regen: 2.5% >>> 3%

replies.body:
Please let us view ppl by spectate mode and also it will be really useful if you can bring a item list and combination between them by pressing 1 button.. let's say.."TAB"

And last but not least,match history
give them some time the game is still in beta

#i think **Hechtech Gunblade {{item:3146}} is bugged atm**

i saw Hextech Gunblade 3 times in 3 different games and **every single time it healed basically nothing** (and yes : in all these situations the champs were not full HP or almost full HP xD) :

- i had Akali with Gunblade  -> she landed a crit with het ult for ~4000 dmg but healed almost no HP back - she only healed for around 100 HP or something like that but she should have healed 1000 HP!
- i had Gunblade on a Blademaster (i think it was Aatrox) -> he went absolutely ham on the enemy team and landed a crap ton of autoattacks (with the Blademaster buff) but he healed basically nothing - his HP bar was barely moving
- my friend had a Brand with Gunblade -> he used his ult and completely bursted down a couple of enemies but once again: he healed almost no HP at all

**it feels like Hextech Gunblade only heals for around 2.5% of of all damage dealt and not for 25%**
maybe you guys should take a look at the item

Yeah, earlier today I thought it would be good on graves as he was 3 star and had a red buff and titanic hydra and he would auto 3 people and he healed for probably 40-50 dmg even though he was doing 300+ dmg to 3 targets meaning he should have healed for at least 225 dmg.

Nice changes for a start at least. Kinda wish we would do away with double stacking items though, as that seems to be the biggest offender. Also Glacial still needs a hit. Having your entireteam stunlocked for the entire round is not ok when they only have 2-4 Glacials. Should drop the % to like 20/25/30.

the general problem i believe is that it triggers on their attacks, not your attacks, which means that if they stack attackspeed it's basically impossible to catch up once your characters actually been frozen.

The RNG on how many items you get is really frustrating to deal with. I for one would really appreciate a mechanic that evened this out some, such as more creep rounds having guaranteed drops (alongside a lower drop rate to keep the average # the same)
This is already being done on PBE at the moment
Just wondering: How is damage reduction from Armor and Magic Resist calculated? Is the calculation for TFT the same as for Summoner's Rift?
I want to have an opinion, but riot is nerfing Bard on the PBE and it's all I can think about..

Morellonomicon
Burn is no longer triggered by damage from Ionic Spark, Statikk Shiv, and Titanic Hydra
Burn Damage: 5% >>> 2.5%

it still says its 5% in the description of morellos in game

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Oxygen,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=HzAXom8z,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-07-04T05:19:03.491+0000)
>
> Morellonomicon
> Burn is no longer triggered by damage from Ionic Spark, Statikk Shiv, and Titanic Hydra
> Burn Damage: 5% >>> 2.5%
> 
> it still says its 5% in the description of morellos in game


That's what I  have noticed.

2 days ago it was 2,5% Burn Damage.
Yesterday it went back to 5% Burn Damage
Yay Demon wont be absolute shit anymore
wish that were true...
Hope that was sarcasm.

Awesome stuff. Glad to see it all in one place finally. =) Makes managing the Discord for TFT much easier too instead of hunting down images and then typing them up.

( For anyone who wants to join the Discord, here's an invite link: https://discord.gg/kcJV2gF )

also how the fuck do you keep patching this game without removing the rng in the item drop rate? its the most critisized aspect of the mode overall. there is no strategic element to getting dicked over by drop rates.

i just played a game where i had literally 2 components after the first 3 minion rounds, and one of the players had 3 completed items.
If you were following the PBE & other post , you should know that they are working on it and there is something atm on the PBE

> [{quoted}](name=Mctiguy,realm=EUW,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=HzAXom8z,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2019-07-04T18:02:27.338+0000)
>
> If you were following the PBE & other post , you should know that they are working on it and there is something atm on the PBE

i mixed up the posts. still. how long can this take?
I mean reworking a major part of a game. when its literally been out for less than two weeks....... i wouldnt expect anything for like a month at least

> [{quoted}](name=Darkw1ng,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=HzAXom8z,comment-id=000b000000010000,timestamp=2019-07-06T04:21:16.152+0000)
>
> I mean reworking a major part of a game. when its literally been out for less than two weeks....... i wouldnt expect anything for like a month at least

item drop rates shouldnt be that difficult to fix tbh. the game has been out for a few weeks now. the randomized item drop rates had already been heavily critisized when the mode was on the pbe, and it was the first thing people complained about when the mode hit live.

the rioters who playtested the mode should have noticed this problem themselves. its so painfully obvious shitty design.

why are you nerfing garen around being a crap tier unit, when you can just promote him up to a t2 unit?

its correct that hes quite strong for such a cheap unit, but i dont think knights should be nerfed until they feel too weak. their synergy is already garbage tier, and their secondary trait is their only saving grace. especially not around certain items, as long as items drop rates arent even normalized. if his ability is stronger than average for the cheapest units in the game, you could just make him a t2 instead of a t1 and let him keep spinning to win.

do knights even have a t2 unit currently? theyre all either t1 or much higher with poppy, sejuani and kayle, so there is room to just add him in there.

edit.: oh my god, you nerfed garen because he was too strong with morellonomicon and then also cut morellonomicons damage in half at the same time. lol.

this looks a lot like summoners rift balancing all over. some champion is too powerful with a specific item, and you dump him to garbage tier by nerfing the item and the champion in the same patch.

can you just chose one instead?

Riot Beernana can someone please reach out to me as i have an issue with TFT i think will be worth looking into. I tried using Payer Support which directed me here. Please... someone... reach out to me

Hi Riot, is there a place i can submit some information privately concerning the game mode of TFT. i tried to use the support system but they reffered me here. would greatly appreciate it if someone reached out.
Karthus is very broken now, keep spamming ulti and even beat my 2 star Kayle with Noble aura with 3 3 star but enemy Karthus won game solo without any aura and no 3 star with same size of teams.

Hello .
Can you please update the classes and origins in the game . So when the player hover the mouse over a passive then it can show to which champions it is running . 

Sometimes passives feels awkward when running on all as i need to know which one is working to who . Also it will help me to organise the team .

Hello,

I disconnect during the first carousel every game. Is anyone else having this issue?

Really digging TFT, but two requests: One is quality-of-life and the other is a balance issue.

I've been enjoying playing with friends, and using the voice-chat is nice and easy. But when one of us loses, they're cut off from the voice chat. It's really obnoxious and unnecessary. Please let us stay in voice chat together.

It's probably already been mentioned, but the item RNG is really wiggy. Getting screwed over by item drops is really discouraging. Instead of each minion have x% chance to drop an item (or whatever the system is now), maybe something less random would help prevent this problem. For example, surviving the PvE round gets 1 item automatically, strong/fast victory gets 2 items, and RNG the 3rd.

In a more game-centric subject rather than bugfix, I feel the items need some changing, not talking about the drops mind you (althought that in itself is another matter, although I think it's being looked at).

I feel Champions should have more limitations when it comes to items, namely, not being able to stack items of the same name, also it'd be interesting to see what happens what would happen if the limit was 2 items as opposed to the current 3.

As the game is right now, the meta is generally to just get a "main carry" and shove all the items on them, and generally speaking spreading the items out is an ill advised idea, so reducing the "shoving all the items on this dude" strat could open way to a more diversified item meta.

Thank you for the hard work!

One thing, could you guys please look into the issue that some people (although apparently not that many) have regarding the camera? Whenever I play TFT I cannot look at other people's boards, if I click on the other people's icons or use the numbers all it does is show my board in a mirrored manner.

I suspect this has to do with the fact that I tend to alternate between locked and unlocked camera in Normal game, but locked is around 70% of my gametime, and maybe it's just hard-locking the camera due to how my games start/end, I tried some config file changes this morning but haven't had the chance to try them out.

Although I doubt it has something to do with it, I'm being forced to use a Mac computer at the current time (egh).

"reach level 6 before the second draft (round 11)" is impossible. Second draft is actually round 6 as reaching level 6 before round 11 doesn't actually complete the quest. Getting level 6 by round 6 is actually impossible and a lower than a 2% chance as you need pyke on first carosel (which is already hard enough since everyone wants him for shojin pyke) then you need to get graves in the next 3 minion rounds, and then when you hit level 3 you need to hit the 5% gp chance. Then after you hit the 5% gp chance you need to lose streak and get 4 gold from the chest twice in the next two pvp rounds before having to sell all units because you can't do it on the last pvp round since it goes to the carosel and not back to team edit so in theory its a less than 2% chance and i have wasted too many hours of my life trying to complete this mission.
Are Teamfight Tactics in any way incorporated in the Honour system yet?
How to win if 1st PVP you meet 6 items team as 1 items team ????

Are you guys planning on doing something about the near impossible beta pass mission in week 2? On OCE and it doesn't look like it's gonna get fixed by the end of the week when the missions expire since every riot member I have talked to just seems to ignore the issue.
What's the mission?    Every server seems to have different missions.   (EUW right now is "play 5 games to round 20"/"play 20 nobles OR play 20 pirates"/"build a 2* Darius")

OCE is a week ahead with the beta pass since ours was up on launch. It's "reach level 6 by the second shared draft (round 11)"

There's a few issues with this mission. Round 11 isn't even a shared draft. and getting level 6 by this time doesn't complete the mission. No one has managed to do it because it's actually round 6 before the draft at round 7 where you need to do it by. There is a post on the front page of reddit right now talking about it but basically the only way to do it is rolling all 3 pirates and getting good gold drops from that AND selling all units. No other method has been figured out to reach the gold amount on time. So it's like a less than 2% chance to complete if you are going for it. I think someone from riot has noticed though so hopefully it gets fixed in time.
Ow, that's not nice such a near impossible one.     And they should also sync up round numbering formats between in-game and missions. :-|

This Yordle buff ;-; It's already a pain to play against it , but it will be even worse now ;-;

This dodge things , like the glacial stun , is very frustrating to play against . Why not changing it to something like % resistance on YTordle , & Slow ( mouvement & attack speed ) for glacial ?
I missed almost all of those changes, and i read the offical forum every day...

guess u guys are probably busy... but a little formatting would go a long way to making that loooong list easier to read! also, i assume this page will get updated every time there's a micropatch? cos i really don't like checking twitter and would much rather bookmark this page

keep up the great work! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yordle buff was totally unnecessary, it's already strong.
Reason why ppl don't play it is because it's boring.

Demon buff is also unnecessary, it's also strong enough already.

Nidalee with Rapid Firecannon needs to be fixed please.

Any shapeshifter with RFC needs fixed. Elise does the same thing where she still has long range in spider form when she is equipped with RFC.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

6 yordles are so broken it should practically be deemed a gamebreaking bug. I am not sure why you guys think yordles and even demons are underpowered when they aren't at all. Meanwhile pretty much every other class buff like nobles, blademasters and gunslingers are nowhere near close. 

Do you guys even remember that you put 6 knights in the game? It's so unplayable and so terrible that I have no idea why it's even in the game. It's like salt in the wounds when you worry about yordles and demons and can't even see the most underpowered and terrible thing in the game by far that is the 6 knight buff. 

The game is already stale with limited options that I am already bored. If you any of you guys are desparate to win than just get 6 yordles and afk. Make a rank3 garen and it will faceroll for you to the end. My personal favorite is still 6 demons. It's actually unbeatable if done right.
